en.help.meta.description: This command provides an interactive interface to view all available commands, and help for how to use each command. If no command is selected, brief info about all available command will be displayed.

en.devauth.embed.preauth.description: **You haven't setup device authentication on this profile yet**
en.devauth.embed.preauth.description.nosess: **To begin, get an auth code from [here]({0})**
Then simply copy your authorisation code, press the **{0} Authenticate** Button below, and paste your code into the prompt.
en.devauth.embed.preauth.description.active: You already have an active authentication session! You can get started with this account by pressing **{0} Auth With Session**
If you want to switch accounts, you can use [this link]({0}) and then simply enter your authorisation code after pressing the **{1} Authenticate** Button.
en.devauth.embed.legal.title: User Agreement
en.devauth.embed.legal.description: **You have not accepted the user agreement on profile {0}**
en.devauth.embed.legal.agreement2: Usage of these STW Daily features (Device Auth, Settings, Profile, etc) is governed by the following additional set of terms:
en.devauth.embed.legal.agreement4: By making use of these features, you hereby imply agreement to the base set of agreements for STW Daily, available at: {0}. You also agree to these terms outlined within this agreement.
en.devauth.embed.legal.agreement6: Your access to these features exists as a licence which may be revoked at any time for any reason. The STW Daily Dev Team reserves the right to revoke your access at any time for any reason.
en.devauth.embed.legal.agreement8: You are responsible for all account(s) connected to this service, and anything that may occur to them. You are responsible for doing your part to keep your account(s) secure, and safe; DO NOT USE ACCOUNT(S) THAT YOU DO NOT HAVE EMAIL ACCESS TO (unless you understand what you are doing), as a 'password rest' may be triggered on connected account(s).
en.devauth.embed.legal.agreement9: You assume all liability in your use of STW Daily. The STW Daily Team may not be held accountable for any adverse outcome.
en.devauth.embed.legal.agreement11: The STW Daily Team strives to keep your account as secure as possible, while also being transparent and open source. We store some limited information that is linked to your Discord account on a MongoDB Atlas database hosted in America. STW Daily itself is hosted on AWS servers in America. Your account data is securely stored as ciphered AES encrypted data that only part of the STW Daily Team has access to.
en.devauth.embed.legal.agreement13: STW Daily will collect and store very limited data linked to your Discord account, in order to securely store account authentication data for relatively long periods of time, as well as provide you with a great experience both now, and in the future. You may view our Privacy Policy here: {0}
en.devauth.embed.existing.description1: Anytime you try to authenticate without an active session, you'll automatically authenticate with the account linked to this profile.
en.devauth.embed.existing.description2: If you want to remove this link, press the {0} **Remove Link** button
en.devauth.embed.existing.description3: To reauthenticate with this account, press the {0} **Reauthenticate Now** button
en.devauth.embed.existing.description4.enab: To enable auto-claim for all your accounts, press the {0} **Enable Auto Claim** button
en.devauth.embed.existing.description4.disa: To disable auto-claim for all your accounts, press the {0} **Disable Auto Claim** button
en.devauth.embed.existing.hasexpired.descri: {0} **This linked account has expired. Please unlink and relink to continue using this account.**
en.devauth.slash.name: device
en.devauth.slash.description: Create an authentication session that will keep you logged in for a long time
en.devauth.meta.description1: This command allows you to save your authentication session to keep you logged in for a long time. Once you setup this command, you will no longer need to provide your auth code.
en.devauth.meta.description2: Please do not use this command unless you have access to your account's email, as password resets *may* be triggered.
en.devauth.meta.description3: After you setup device authentication, you can use this command to opt-in to the auto-claim trial period. This will automatically claim your STW Daily rewards every day. You can opt-out of this at any time.

en.stw.item.HeroXP.name: Hero XP
en.stw.item.HeroXP.desc: Used to level heroes and defenders. Can be found in llamas and by retiring heroes or defenders.
en.stw.item.Voucher_BasicPack.desc: Claim your free reward llama in the Loot tab.
en.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_R.name: Rare Hero
en.stw.item.CardPack_Ranged_R.name: Rare Ranged Weapon Schematic
en.stw.item.CardPack_Melee_R.name: Rare Melee Weapon Schematic
en.stw.item.Reagent_C_T01.desc: Resource used to evolve all types of items.
en.stw.item.SID_Pistol_FireCracker_R_Ore_T0: Pistol: Special. Launches firecrackers that bounce off walls, and will knockback and damage enemies in a small radius when they explode.
en.stw.item.CardPack_Trap_R.name: Rare Trap Schematic
en.stw.item.CardPack_Defender_R.name: Rare Defender
en.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_VR.name: Epic Hero
en.stw.item.Currency_MtxSwap.name: V-Bucks Voucher
en.stw.item.Currency_MtxSwap.desc: Turns into X-Ray Tickets for everyone, and also V-Bucks if you have a Founders account.
en.stw.item.Currency_XRayLlama.name: X-Ray Tickets
en.stw.item.Currency_XRayLlama.desc: Currency earned by completing Daily Quests, Storm Shield Defenses, and some Mission Alerts. Traded for X-Ray Llamas in the Llama Shop.
en.stw.item.Currency_Hybrid_MTX_XRayLlama.d: Turns into X-Ray Tickets for everyone, and also V-Bucks if you have a Founders account.
en.stw.item.CardPack_Manager_R.name: Rare Lead Survivor
en.stw.item.SmallXpBoost.desc: Activate an XP Boost to gain Account XP boost points. Boost points earn {0} more experience for yourself, as well as give a {0} bonus to all other players on your team! If you are a Founder, you automatically grant a 5% bonus to all your team mates. The more players that use XP Boosts, the bigger the bonus for everyone!
en.stw.item.CardPack_Worker_VR.name: Epic Survivor
en.stw.item.EventCurrency_Scaling.name: Gold
en.stw.item.EventCurrency_Scaling.desc: Special currency earned by completing missions and opening mini llamas. Can be traded for items in the Event Store.
en.stw.item.CardPack_Bronze.desc: The old faithful llama, packed with a variety of goodies and upgrade materials. Contains at least 4 items, including a rare item or a hero! Has a high chance to upgrade.
en.stw.item.Reagent_C_T02.name: Lightning in a Bottle
en.stw.item.Reagent_C_T02.desc: Resource used to evolve all types of items. Found primarily in Plankerton.
en.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_SR.name: Legendary Hero
en.stw.item.Reagent_C_T03.name: Eye of the Storm
en.stw.item.Reagent_C_T03.desc: Resource used to evolve all types of items. Found primarily in Canny Valley.
en.stw.item.SmallXpBoost_Gift.desc: Activate a Teammate XP Boost to give a teammate Account XP boost points. Boost points earn {0} more experience for a teammate, as well as give a {1} bonus to you and the other players on your team!  The more players that use XP Boosts, the bigger the bonus for everyone!
en.stw.item.CardPack_Worker_SR.name: Legendary Survivor
en.stw.item.CardPack_Event_Founders.name: Founder's Llama
en.stw.item.CardPack_Event_Founders.desc: A special event pack! Guarantees one Founder's Epic weapon with a powerful level 5 perk.
en.stw.item.Reagent_C_T04.name: Storm Shard
en.stw.item.Reagent_C_T04.desc: Resource used to evolve all types of items. Found primarily in Twine Peaks.
en.wex.item.CD_Cleric_VR2_Dark_TerraRifle_T: Provides tactical support for the team.
en.wex.item.CD_Pet_UC1_Painguin_Water_T03.d: Unassumingly waddles his way into enemy forces before self destructing.
en.wex.item.CD_Pet_VR2_Spry_Light_T04.desc: Fires low cost elemental bolts of magic.
en.wex.item.CD_Pet_VR2_Spry_Light_T04.name: Spry
en.wex.item.Gold.desc: Collect gold to purchase goods and services.
en.wex.item.Gold.name: Gold
en.wex.item.Hammer.name: Hammer
en.wex.item.MtxGiveaway.name: Gems
en.wex.item.Ore_Iron.desc: Ingredient. Common ore used to upgrade armor. Can be found in the Burny Mine level near the Burny Volcano.
en.wex.item.Ore_Iron.name: Armour Ore
en.wex.item.Ore_Magicite.desc: Ingredient. Rare ore used to evolve weapons and armor. Can be found in the Burny Mine and is occasionally available in the Marketplace.
en.wex.item.Ore_Magicite.name: Magicite
en.wex.item.Ore_Silver.desc: Ingredient. Common ore used to upgrade weapons. Can be found in the Burny Mine level near the Burny Volcano.
en.wex.item.Ore_Silver.name: Weapon Ore
en.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Bronze.desc: Blinks rapidly near certain techno-magic crystals until it short circuits. Can be used to recruit common and uncommon heroes.
en.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Bronze.name: Proximity Locator
en.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Elemental.desc: Hero Traces. A magic map trace that can lead to a trapped hero. Used to unlock Skybreaker Quests for elemental heroes.
en.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Elemental.name: Core Hero Traces
en.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_SuperRare.desc: Hero Traces. A magical map trace that can lead to a trapped hero. Used to unlock Skybreaker Quests for Super Rare Heroes.
en.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_SuperRare.name: Legendary Hero Traces
en.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialArmor.de: Ingredient. Used to evolve special heroes. Primarily found in the Secret Shop.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialShield.d: Ingredient. Used to evolve special heroes. Primarily found by completing Event Dungeons.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialSword.de: Ingredient. Used to evolve special heroes. Primarily found by completing Weekly Challenges.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Dark.desc: Ingredient. A valuable shard used to promote heroes. Commonly acquired by selling units, rarely dropped by bosses.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Dark.name: Dark Essence
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Fire.desc: Ingredient. A valuable shard used to promote heroes. Commonly acquired by selling units, rarely dropped by bosses.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Fire.name: Fire Essence
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Light.desc: Ingredient. A valuable shard used to promote heroes. Commonly acquired by selling units, rarely dropped by bosses.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Light.name: Light Essence
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Nature.desc: Ingredient. A valuable shard used to promote heroes. Commonly acquired by selling units, rarely dropped by bosses.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Nature.name: Nature Essence
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Water.desc: Ingredient. A valuable shard used to promote heroes. Commonly acquired by selling units, rarely dropped by bosses.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Water.name: Water Essence
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_MysteryGoo.desc: Ingredient. Used to Supercharge heroes. Primarily found by selling Super Rare heroes.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_MysteryGoo.name: Mysterious Goo
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_T02.desc: Ingredient. Primarily used to evolve and promote heroes. Found in drops throughout the world.
en.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_T02.name: Power Source
en.wex.item.SkillXP.desc: Currency. Can be used to increase the special ability level of any hero. Found primarily in friend gift chests.
en.wex.item.SkillXP.name: Special Ability XP
en.wex.item.TM_MapResource.desc: Dungeon Key. Used to unlock special levels. Primarily found in Trials and in the Marketplace. Locked levels have no failure penalty nor partial completion rewards.
en.wex.item.TM_MapResource.name: Lockpick
en.wex.item.TM_Special_EasterEggDesert.desc: Dungeon Key. Grants access to an enchanting Desert. Treasure is abundant in this arid wasteland! There is no failure penalty nor a partial completion reward.
en.wex.item.TM_Special_EasterEggDesert.name: Buried in the Desert Map
en.wex.item.TM_Special_PlanetCore.desc: Dungeon Key. Grants access to the Planet's Core. Its entrance was once thought to be a cave of wonders. There is no failure penalty nor a partial completion reward.
en.wex.item.TM_Special_PlanetCore.name: Planet's Core Map
en.wex.item.TM_Special_UnderwaterForest.des: Dungeon Key. Grants access to an Underwater Forest. This submerged woods may hold many secrets and surprises. There is no failure penalty nor a partial completion reward.
en.wex.item.TM_Special_UnderwaterTunnel.des: Dungeon Key. Grants access to an Underwater Tunnel. Legends say this tunnel was formed by a powerful mage. There is no failure penalty nor a partial completion reward.
en.wex.item.TM_WaterfallValley_Map7.desc: Dungeon Key. Grants access to the Waterfall Valley. Known both for its resplendent beauty, and those who vanished in search of its secrets. There is no failure penalty, nor partial completion rewards.
en.wex.item.TM_WaterfallValley_Map7.name: Secret Waterfall Map
en.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMajor.desc: Provides a large, permanent increase to maximum HP.
en.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMajor.name: Major Health Elixir
en.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMinor.desc: Provides a small, permanent increase to maximum HP.
en.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMinor.name: Minor Health Elixir
en.wex.item.UpgradeMana.desc: Provides a permanent increase to mana.
en.wex.item.UpgradeMana.name: Mana Elixir
en.wex.item.UpgradeStrengthMajor.desc: Provides a large, permanent increase to maximum ATK.
en.wex.item.UpgradeStrengthMajor.name: Major Strength Elixir
en.wex.item.UpgradeStrengthMinor.desc: Provides a small, permanent increase to ATK.
en.wex.item.UpgradeStrengthMinor.name: Minor Strength Elixir
en.wex.item.Voucher_Chest_Gold.desc: A Magic Chest full of loot! Open it in your Chests menu.
en.wex.item.Voucher_Chest_Gold.name: Magic Chest
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroDiamond.desc: Exchange this in the store for a super rare hero!
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroDiamond.name: Diamond Hero Crystal
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroGold.desc: Exchange this in the store for a very rare or better hero! Chance to find from using Silver Hero Crystals or opening chests in the store.
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroGold.name: Gold Hero Crystal
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Dark.desc: Exchange this in the store to acquire a rare or better hero! Chance to find by opening chests in the store.
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Dark.name: Dark Hero Crystal
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Fire.desc: Exchange this in the store to acquire a rare or better hero! Chance to find by opening chests in the store.
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Fire.name: Fire Hero Crystal
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Light.desc: Exchange this in the store to acquire a rare or better hero! Chance to find by opening chests in the store.
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Light.name: Light Hero Crystal
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Nature.desc: Exchange this in the store to acquire a rare or better hero! Chance to find by opening chests in the store.
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Nature.name: Nature Hero Crystal
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Water.desc: Exchange this in the store to acquire a rare or better hero! Chance to find by opening chests in the store.
en.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Water.name: Water Hero Crystal
